s.text: I hope that the board and upper management rot in jail and never see the light of day again - apart from when you are exercising in the open prison yard in your shackles

Message-ID: <28168211.1075860837271.JavaMail.evans@thyme> Date: Fri, 30 Nov 2001 07:29:18 -0800 (PST) From: exenron@hotmail.com To: kenneth.lay@enron.com, mark.pickering@enron.com, beth.perlman@enron.com Subject: Thank you all very much for your support - NOT!
I hope that the board and upper management rot in jail and never see the light of day again - apart from when you are exercising in the open prison yard in your shackles
